definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: Pityriasis rosea-eliminating mixture can counteract the allergy induced by DNFB.
sentences.chinese: 祛玫合剂可以拮抗由DNFB诱发的小鼠变态反应。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the therapeutic effects of Tongbi capsule on allergic rhinitis in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 探讨通鼻胶囊对豚鼠变态反应性鼻炎的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Asthma is a respiratory tract allergic disease commonly encountered by children.
sentences.chinese: 哮喘是小儿常见的呼吸道变态反应性疾病。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Tongbi capsule has inhibitory action on allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 通鼻胶囊对豚鼠变态反应性鼻炎有一定的抑制作用。

sentences.english: In this paper, 20 cases of allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis(ABPA) were reported with review of literature.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告了20例变态反应性支气管肺曲霉菌病。

sentences.english: The results revealed that osteonecrosis could be induced by simple allergic disease.
sentences.chinese: 结果显示单纯变态反应性疾病即可导致骨坏死发生。

sentences.english: Find more allergy book reviews on the WAO Website here.
sentences.chinese: WAO网站上其它的变态反应学书评见此处。

sentences.english: This report discusses the immunopathologic mechanism of these allergys in the disease process of EHF.
sentences.chinese: 对以上各型变态反应在EHF发病中的作用进行探讨。

sentences.english: The development of acu-moxibustion in treating allergic rhinitis(AR)in recent years was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了近年来针灸治疗变态反应性鼻炎的概况。

sentences.english: To determine the effect of Oxfenmino hydrochloric acid on delayed allergic reaction in mouse.
sentences.chinese: 观察盐酸奥芬米洛对小鼠迟发型变态反应的影响。

sentences.english: The anti-inflammatory and anti-allergic effects of Cortex Moutan Radicis were reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告了丹皮的抗炎作用和抗变态反应作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the association between nasopharyngeal carcinoma(NPC) and allergic disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼻咽癌发病与变态反应性疾病的关系。

sentences.english: He used different methods to test for allergies.
sentences.chinese: 他用不同的方法测定变态反应性。

sentences.english: This is the website of Clinical and Molecular Allergy.
sentences.chinese: 这是临床与分子变态反应的网站。

definition: histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
